mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS(USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, TEL, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, SEX,BIRTH, EMAIL, DETAILADDRESS) VALUES (#{ID}, #{PW}, #{NAME}, #{TEL}, #{ADDRESS}, #{POSTCODE}, '사람',#{BIRTH}, #{EMAIL}, #{DETAILADDRESS} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(B.BAN_SEQ,0) BAN_SEQ, NVL(B.STORED_NAME,'none') STORED_NAME,NVL(A.PRO_SEQ,0) PRO_SEQ FROM MAINBANNER A INNER JOIN PHOTO B ON A.BAN_SEQ=B.BAN_SEQ RIGHT OUTER JOIN DUAL ON A.BAN_SEQ=B.BAN_SEQ ORDER BY A.BAN_SEQ DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT AA.SALE_CNT,BB.STORED_NAME,AA.PRO_NAME,AA.PRO_CONTENT,AA.PRO_SEQ,AA.PRO_PRICE FROM (SELECT COUNT(A.PRO_SEQ) SALE_CNT, B.PRO_NAME, B.PRO_CONTENT, B.PRO_SEQ, B.PRO_PRICE FROM SALES A INNER JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRO_SEQ=B.PRO_SEQ WHERE B.ITEM=#{ITEM} GROUP BY A.PRO_SEQ,B.PRO_NAME,B.PRO_CONTENT,B.PRO_SEQ,B.PRO_PRICE ORDER BY SALE_CNT DESC) AA LEFT OUTER JOIN PHOTO BB ON AA.PRO_SEQ=BB.PRO_SEQ WHERE BB.STORED_NAME LIKE '%MAIN%' ORDER BY SALE_CNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=3
SELECT SUB_ITEM, ITEM FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY SUB_ITEM,ITEM ORDER BY ITEM , SUB_ITEM
